author: Tom Hennigan
title: Coronavirus: Brazilians protest as Bolsonaro misinterprets WHO advice
description: President continues campaign against lockdown but moderates tone in national address
content:
Brazilians once again took to banging pots and pans on Tuesday night in protest at another chaotic day in the countrys response to the coronavirus pandemic on which President Jair Bolsonaro distorted advice from the World Health Organisation (WHO).
The far-r… [+2620 chars]
